Address.label: Address
Address.value: 129 MARTEN STREET, MONDOVI, Wisconsin, 54755, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Marten Transport Ltd is a temperature-sensitive truckload carrier in the United States. It is engaged in transporting and distributing food and other consumer packaged goods which requires a temperature-controlled or insulated environment. The company operates through four segments including Truckload, Dedicated, Intermodal, and Brokerage.

value.name: Adam D. Phillips
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
